node.excerpt:
The Shadow of the Earth is the second design from the We are Animals I series, a series of
pieces portraying great minds wronged by humanity’s thoughts. This piece shows Suzanne Césaire. 
She was born in Martinique, an overseas department of France located in the Caribbean Sea. 
She was a French…

frontmatter.title: The Shadow of the Earth
frontmatter.description: This piece shows Suzanne Césaire. French writer, teacher, theorist, anti-colonial, and an active feminist. She is the creator of the Afro-Surrealism and co-founder of the journal Tropiques.
